SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Access
The Access is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the login and the registration operation
AccessMessage
The AccessMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: login/registration
AnsiColor
Definition of colors with ANSI codes
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
Card
The Card class represents a card.
CardList
The CardList class represents a list of cards)
CardType
indicates the type of the card.
ChatHistory
The ChatHistory class represents the history of the messages sent through the chat
ChatManager
The ChatManager is one of Runnable executes by GameController It manages the chat messages
ChatMessage
The ChatMessage implements Message for communication between client and server Used to notify a chat
Client
The Client abstract class is used to represents user's identity It also provides methods to inform user about some action result/error
ClientAction
The ClientAction interface provides methods to notify server about a client side action Class that implements this: SocketAction, RMIAction
ClientApp
 
ClientController
The ClientController class is used on client side to remember: the client's UserInterface choice and ClientAction, and the current connection status
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler thread permits to handle client, one instance for each client
ClientManager
The ClientManager class manages all clients(users) that are currently connected to the server
Color
indicates the color of the player.
CreateLobbyMessage
The CreateLobbyMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: lobby creation
Desk
Desk is a class that contains: 4 deck of Card, one for each card type 2 displayed card list, 1 card that represent the first card of resource card deck 1 card that represent the first card of gold card deck some methods to pick a card Note: there are only card ids here, therefore only integers and not card objects
DeskTest
 
DrawCard
The DrawCard is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the draw of a card according the location that client drew In the end it calls the execution of TurnManager Runnable
DrawCardMessage
The DrawCardMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: try to draw a card
DrawGoals
The DrawCard is one of Runnable executed for the progression of a game It is called to execute by PlayInitialCard in specific condition It manages the draw of all public or private objective(goal) cards
EmptyDeckException
The EmptyDeckException is an exception that is thrown when a deck in Desk is finished
EndGame
The EndGame is one of Runnable executed for the progression of a game It is called to execute by TurnManager in specific conditions It manages the calculation of goal points and the termination of the game
ErrorMessage
The ErrorMessage implements Message [server -> client] Used to notify a negative client action result
ErrorType
The ErrorType enum represents the different negative results of client actions - CREDENTIALS_WRONG: the login credentials entered by the used are incorrect - NICKNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: the nickname used for registration is already in use by another user - ACCOUNT_ALREADY_LOGGED: the player is already logged in - INVALID_CARD_ID: the card id is invalid - GOLD_CARD_CONDITION_NOT_RESPECTED: the condition imposed by the gold card is not fulfilled - LOBBY_ID_NOT_FOUND: the lobby id entered by the player is not found
For2PlayersLobby
 
For3PlayersLobby
 
For4PlayersLobby
 
ForConnection
 
ForFinalResult
 
ForHome
 
ForInGame
 
ForInitialCard
 
ForJoinMode
 
ForLobbyChoose
 
ForLobbyCreation
 
ForLogin
 
ForPersonalGoal
 
ForPlayerBoard
 
ForRegistration
 
Game
 
GameController
The GameController is the class that manages all user actions by executing the corresponding method or task
GameControllerTest
 
GameState
indicates the state of the game, it can be one of the following - SETUP_PHASE_1: waiting for players to place their initial card - SETUP_PHASE_2: waiting for players to choose their personal goal - PLAY_CARD: current player is placing a card - DRAW_CARD: current player is drawing a card - TURN_MANAGE: the next player is being chosen - ENDING: game is ending - FINISHED: game has ended
GameTest
Tests for class Game
GoalType
FFF: set of 3 FUNGI AAA: set of 3 animal PPP: set of 3 PLANT III: set of 3 INSECT BB: set of 2 INK_BOTTLE FF: set of 2 FEATHER PP: set of 2 PARCHMENT BFP: set of 1 ink bottle, 1 feather and 1 parchment REDG: position card 3 red increase BLUEG: position card 3 blue increase VIOLAD: position card 3 viola decrease GREEND: position card 3 green decrease BBR: position card 3 blue_blue red VVB: position card 3 viola_viola blue RRG: position card 3 red_red green GGV: position card 3 green_green viola
GoldCard
 
GUIApplication
The GUI class represents Graphical User Interface It implements UserInterface
HeartbeatMessage
The HeartbeatMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to maintain connection alive
HeartbeatSender
The HeartbeatSender is a thread that sends heartbeat messages periodically
IllegalCoordinateInsertionException
The IllegalCoordinateInsertionException is an exception that is thrown when the position of card is invalid.
ImmutableEndGameInfo
The ImmutableEndGameInfo is an immutable class that implements Serializable interface It is used in the communication between server and client It contains all information about final result of a game
ImmutableGame
The ImmutableGame is an immutable class that implements Serializable interface It is used in the communication between server and client It contains all information about a game status
ImmutableLobby
The ImmutableLobby is an immutable class that implements Serializable interface It is used in the communication between server and client It contains all information about a lobby
ImmutablePlayer
The ImmutablePlayer is an immutable class that implements Serializable interface It is used in the communication between server and client It contains all information about a player status
InitialCard
 
InvalidIdCardException
The InvalidIdCardException is an exception that is thrown when Idcard does not match the type of card used by the method.
InvalidNumOfConnectedPlayer
InvalidNumOfPlayer defines an exception when there is a number that fails to start the game
InvalidNumOfHandCardsException
The MaxiNumOfHandCardsReachedException is an exception that is thrown when number of cards is reached.
JoinLobbyMessage
The JoinLobbyMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: join a lobby
Lobby
 
LocationType
The LocationType enum represents the different locations where the card is drawn
Message
Message is used as a base interface for all types of messages exchanged between server and client It implements Serializable.
MessageExecutor
The MessageExecutor is a class that handles messages
MessageReader
The MessageReader is a thread that read messages sent by server
MessageType
The MessageType enum represents the different general messages
ModelObservable
A model class can extends ModelObservable when it wants to be observable
ModelObserver
A class can implement the ModelObserver interface when it wants to be informed of changes in observable objects.
NotifyMessage
The NotifyMessage implements Message [server -> client] Used to notify a positive client action result and any model changes
NotifyType
The NotifyType enum represents the different positive results of client actions
NotInProgressException
 
ObjectiveCard
 
PageType
The PageType enum represents the different pages of graphical user interface
PersonalGoalChooseMessage
The PersonalGoalChooseMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: choice of private objective(goal) card
PlayCard
The PlayCard is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the play of a card
PlayCardMessage
The PlayCardMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: try to play a card
Player
Player is a class that contains information of each player -nickname: player's name -position: player's turn during game -point: points acquired during game -goalPoint: points acquired from objective cards -playerColor: player's color -personalGoal: objective that each player has to realize in order to acquire points at the end of game -handCards define list of card in hand of player.
PlayerBoard
 
PlayerBoardTest
 
PlayerDisconnect
The PlayerDisconnect is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the disconnection of a player currently in game
PlayInitCardMessage
The PlayInitCardMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: play of initial card
PlayInitialCard
The PlayInitialCard is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the play of initial card
ReqLobbiesMessage
The ReqLobbiesMessage implements Message [client -> server] Used to notify a client action: the choice of join an existing lobby (then request available lobbies)
Resource
class that provides information about cards based on id and side.
RMIAction
The RMIAction class implements ClientAction interface Notifies the server of client actions when the chosen connection type is RMI
RMIClient
 
RMIClientImpl
The RMIClientImpl class is an implementation of the RMIClientInterface interface.
RMIClientInterface
The RMIClientInterface represents a client in a network communication.
RMIObserver
The RMIObserver class implements ModelObserver It represents observer connected with RMI
RMIServerImpl
 
RMIServerInterface
 
ServerApp
 
SetPersonalGoal
The SetPersonalGoal is one of Runnable executed by GameController It manages the choice of the personal objective(goal) card
SocketAction
The SocketAction class implements ClientAction interface Notifies the server of client actions when the chosen connection type is socket
SocketClient
The SocketClient class is a subtype of Client It represents client connected with socket
SocketObserver
The SocketObserver class implements ModelObserver It represents observer connected with socket
Start
The Start is one of Runnable executed for the progression of a game It is called to execute by SetPersonalGoal in specific condition It manages the choice of the player who begins to play (randomly) and start the game
Symbol
 
TUI
The TUI class provides all methods needed for a Textual User Interface It implements UserInterface
TurnManager
The TurnManager is one of Runnable executed for the progression of a game, called to execute by DrawCard It manages the change of turn and checks if end game condition is fulfilled
UserInterface
The UserInterface interface provides methods that determine what will be shown on the user screen
